item.description:
Please join us for an informal gathering to view the recently released BBC documentary entitled "A Farm for the Future" which focuses on agriculture and food production in relation to peak oil. Permaculture features highly.

Meet at 7:00 pm *Dessert-only* potluck (please bring a sweet/fruit, tea or juice to share)
Film to start at 7:30 (approx 48 min long)
Discussion to follow.
Tea and ice water provided. Please bring your own dish/cup/utensils for dessert!

We will be meeting at Penelope's house. For privacy reasons I will be emailing the address to "yes" RSVP folks rather than posting it online. Thanks! (It is in Portland).

http://www.bbc.co.uk/...
